item.title: B&B Dieweg
item.body: Enjoy the calm and tranquillity of a beautiful district in the south of Brussels. In a very pleasant environment, a charming multilingual lady, whose passions include travel, gardening and museums, will open the doors of her house to you. A welcome in French, Dutch, English German or Spanish.Twin room with washbasin "Bambou" - shared bathroom - 15 minutes from the city centre by car - stay from 2 to 30 days. Location : Dieweg - Brussels 1180 Access : Bus : 60 Tram 92- 97 close by.

item.title: B&B Woluwé
item.body: In a house which has been laid out with impeccable taste. Lots of greenery, and very warm welcome.Twin bed in the mezzanine (second floor) - private bathroom and WC - possibility of a second room for 2 persons - TV - WIFI - 15 minutes by underground from the city centre - no animals (1 dog in the house) - no smoker - stay : from 1 to 30 days. Location : rue de la Station de Woluwé - 1200 Bruxelles Access : Subway station Roodebeek Bus 42 Tram 39-44 (Montgomery)
item.address: rue de la station de Woluwé

item.title: B&B Copernic
item.body: Guest room close by the weather Observatory of Brussels, you are welcome in a very nice house by a lovely couple in either French, Dutch, English or Italian. The area is calm and green, but close from numerous restaurants. The train station " Saint Job " is not far and the car parking easy.Twins bedroom ( 2nd floor) - Bathroom to share with the family - no smoking - no pets - possible access to a TV (other room) - stay from 1 to 30 nights. Location : Rue Copernic 1180 Brussels Access : Tram : 92 Bus : 60 (quartier Européén) 134 (Gare du Midi) Train : St-Job (line 26)

item.title: B&B Broustin
item.body: This housing is located at a stone's throw of the 'Basilique de Koekelberg' in the north of Brussels. A music-loving landlord will welcome you in his large flat on the 2nd floor of a traditional Brussels House. You are at a 5-minute metro ride from the city centre. Stays from 1 to 30 nights.Double room (2de floor) - shared bathroom - non smoking - no pets - private entrance - free parking in the neighbourhood. Location : Av Broustin 1090 Bruxelles Access : Métro Elisabeth / Simonis (a 5-minute walk) Line 2 or 6 (5 minutes walking distance)Tram 19 Bus 87 - ring Brussels (10 min.) -

item.title: B&B Invalides
item.body: Located in the East of Brussels in an area that is well deserved by public transport, a couple of retired persons who used to travel a lot will share their passion for their city. An important collection of travel books is waiting for you. Lots of restaurants in the neighborhood. Quick access to the European Center, the city center and the Expo park by underground. You are welcomed in French, English, Dutch and German.50 m² apartment (ground floor) - twin room - private showerroom and toilets - small terrace - stay from 1 to 30 nights - no smoking - no animals (1 dog in the house).Late arrivals ok , Location : Boulevard des Invalides 1160 Bruxelles Access : direct au ring (arrivée E 411) Métro : Beaulieu /Delta

item.title: B&B Auderghem
B&B Markelbach
B&B Berlaymont
item.body: Located in a quiet area, next to the European institutions, a comfy guest room is at your disposal. The city centre is only 10 minutes away by public transport. The landlady welcomes you either in French, Dutch or English.Twin room (1st floor) - Private shower and toilets - fridge - sauna (8€ pp or 6 €pp if 2 people) - no pets - no smoking - Stays from 1 to 15 nights- possibility of garage Location : Av de la Brabançonne 1000 Bruxelles Access : Métro schuman Bus : 29-64-61-63 - 21-12 (Bus express aéroport)

item.title: B&B Van Lerberghe
item.body: In a quiet area in the North of Brussels, a married couple invites you to their home. Your host will tell you all about his city, which he loves and knows inside and out. English, French and Dutch spoken.Single room (2nd floor) - common shower room - no animals - you may not smoke in the bedroom - length of stay: 1 day to 1 month Situation : rue Van Lerberghe 1030 Bruxelles Access : Tram 55-7 Bus : 65-66

item.title: B&B Vandersmissen
item.body: object height="321" width="400">

item.title: B&B Père de Deken
item.body: In a neighbourhood in the East of Brussels, near a shopping street with lots of small restaurants, you are welcome in a pleasant, large house. The family is pleased to have you. The nearby public transportation brings you to the centre of the city in ten minutes. Cinquantenaire Park: 5 minutes.Double room on the 2nd floor - private bathroom - possibility to access the kitchen- no smokers - no animals - length of stay: 1 day to 1 month. Situation : Rue Père De Deken 1040 Brussels Metro Thieffrry - Bus 36 - Tram 7-90-39-44

item.title: B&B Gisseleire Versé
item.body: <object width="400" height="321"> <param value="http://www.youtube.com/v/Pn1Oy-Dq7sA?fs=1&hl=fr_FR" name="movie" /> <param value="true" name="allowFullScreen" /> <param value="always" name="allowscriptaccess" /><embed width="400" height="321" allowfullscreen="true" allowscriptaccess="always" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" src="http://www.youtube.com/v/Pn1Oy-Dq7sA?fs=1&hl=fr_FR"></embed></object>

item.title: B&B Etangs d'Ixelles
item.body: The room is very well located in the area of the Ixelles ponds, Flagey place and La Cambre Abbey (Louise Ave). The landlady owning this Brussels house welcomes you either in French, Dutch or English. The area is within easy access from public transport and the city centre is 10 minutes away. In the neighbourhood: lots of restaurants and shops, local market every Saturday, Ixelles museum, etc.Double bed or twin bed (1st floor) - private bathroom - possibility of a second room for 2 - terrace - no smoking - no pets - stays from 2 to 30 nights Situation : Chaussée de Vleurgat - 1000 Bruxelles Accès : Tram 23-25-93-94 Bus 38 (quartier européen)

item.title: B&B Marché au charbon
item.body: In the very heart of the city centre, a few steps away from the Grand Place, enjoy your stay in a house decorated in an original way by your hosts. French, English, Dutch and even a few words of Italian and Spanish are spoken. Various activities in the immediate surroundings: historic centre, museums, cinemas, shops, bars and restaurants, cybercafé Stay from 1 night to 3 nights.Double "Chocolat" room (3 rd floor) - ensuite shower and toilet - NON smoking - no pets allowed (2 dogs in the house) - paying car park at 50 metres.The owner reserves the right to assign the preferred room Location: rue Marché au Charbon - 1000 Brussels Access : metro station Bourse - tram 52-55-56-81 bus 3

item.title: B&B Barrière St Gilles
item.body: The entire family of this house will make you feel instantly at home. Located in a neighbourhood which is very close to the city centre, and at the heart of the Art Nouveau area.Double room and private bathroom (2nd floor) - no pets - stay from 1 day to 30 days - no smokers. Situation : chaussée d'Alsemberg - 1060 Bruxelles Metro Horta - Trams 3 - 4 - 33 -51

item.title: B&B François Bossaerts
item.body: Self-contained apartment. Ideal for a family or a group of friends. The proprietor is a lady with a very open personality. This guestroom is ideal place to spend a few days, two weeks. 15 minutes from the city centre by bus or tramway.Twin bed (2nd floor) - living room - dining room- kitchen -bathroom - WC - no smokers - no animals - stay from 2 days to 2 weeks. Location : rue François Bossaerts - 1030 Brussels Tram 90 - busses 54 & 65

item.title: B&B BIhOme
item.body: Close to the majestic town hall of Schaarbeek, the owner of a mansion dating from 1902 offers a room designed to reduce the risks of allergy. Nearby: Les Halles de Schaerbeek, Le Botanique, the Autrique house and many other Art Nouveau buildings. Many restaurants and snack bars. Possibility of breakfast for specific allergies to lactose, gluten and BIO. With nice weather, the breakfast can be served in the garden, along with the rabbit. Twin Room (3rd Floor / stairs) private shower room and toilet - baby chair - no smoking - no pets - stay of 1 to 30 nights (no kitchen).Situation : av Maréchal Foch 1030 BruxellesAccess : tram : 7-55-92 Bus 58-59-65-66 Métro Botanique à 15 minutes à pied

item.title: B&B Reyers
item.body: Discover an accommodation decorated with taste in an original way, a few steps away from the Meiser place located in the North of Brussels. Easy access from the motorway and Brussels Airport. You are welcomed in French, English, Dutch or Spanish.Twin room (1st floor) "Le Grand Jacques" - private bathroom and toilets - no pets - no smoking - stays from 1 to 30 nights (without kitchen) Location : Boulevard Reyers 1030 Bruxelles Access : Tram 7 -25 Bus : 21-29-63-65 11 et 12 (Airportline)

item.title: B&B Galeries
item.body: <object width="400" height="321"> <param value="http://www.youtube.com/v/iZ68_shCcmU?fs=1&hl=fr_FR" name="movie" /> <param value="true" name="allowFullScreen" /> <param value="always" name="allowscriptaccess" /><embed width="400" height="321" allowfullscreen="true" allowscriptaccess="always" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" src="http://www.youtube.com/v/iZ68_shCcmU?fs=1&hl=fr_FR"></embed></object>

item.title: B&B Grand Place
item.body: In the very heart of the city centre, a few steps away from the Grand Place, enjoy your stay in a house decorated in an original way by your hosts. French, English, Dutch and even a few words of Italian and Spanish are spoken. Various activities in the immediate surroundings: historic centre, museums, cinemas, shops, bars and restaurants, cybercafé Stay from 1 night to 3 nights.Double room (3 rd floor) - ensuite shower and toilet - NON smoking - no pets allowed - paying car park at 150 metres.The owner reserves the right to assign the preferred room Location: rue Marché au Charbon - 1000 Brussels Access : metro station Anneessens- tram 52-55-56-81 bus 3

item.title: B&B Georges Henri
item.body: Accommodation in a village house located in calm area to the Eastern of Brussels. Thanks to public transport, you reach the city centre within 10 minutes.Shopping streets, restaurants, parc, ... are located nearby. You are welcomed in French.Twin room " Violette " (1st floor) - shower and toilets within the room - microwave - stays from 2 to 8 nights. Location : rue des Menuisiers 1200 Bruxelles Access : métro Gribaumont Bus : 22 - 39 - 44 -81

item.title: B&B les habitats nomades
item.body: Warm welcome in a house decorated in a tasty and original way and located in a multicultural area next to the city centre. Brussels South station is only a few steps away from the accommodation. The landlords, passionate about art and culture, welcome you either in French, Italian, English, Spanish and some German and Dutch. Stay from 1 to 30 nightsDouble bed "BD"(3rd floor) - private shouwer room and toilets - no smoking - no pets - pay parking (Brussels South station). Location : rue de l'Instruction 1070 Bruxelles Access : Gare du midi Tram 81-82-32

item.title: B&B A la villa des Roses Voltaire
item.body:
If you dream about calm and independence, this guest room will suit you perfectly. The landlords make a fully furnished studio duplex 65 m2 available for you. You are welcomed in French, Dutch and English for those who love green areas, the Josaphat Park is only a few steps away. Easy access from the motorway and the Zaventem airport.Twin room (3rd floor / stairs)- private bathroom and toilets- extra sofa bed- stays from 1 to 30 nights - no smoking - no pets.
Situation : avenue Voltaire 1030 Bruxelles (Schaerbeek)
.Access : Trams : 7 - 56 (gare du Nord) 92 Bus : 59-69

item.title: B&B Opale
item.body: Accommodation located in a residential district very close to the Cinquantenaire Park and the European district. Spacious room in Art Déco style, Moorish influence, with private bathroom and large terrace. Easy access by motorway and from Brussels airport. Numerous public transport lines, including to Brussels airport (10 minutes). Garage. Shops, green spaces and restaurants nearby. French, Dutch and English spoken; elementary knowledge of German and Italian. Also suitable for long stays as accommodation for a writer or comic strip author. Libraries of French-language and Dutch-language Belgian literature.Double room (1st floor) – extra sofa bed (2 people) – private bathroom - 1 to 31 night stays - no animals – No smoking - "Villo" (bicycle sharing) station.Situation : avenue de L'Opale 1030 BruxellesAccess : pré-Métro 7-25 Bus 21 -29- 61 -63 Bus aéroport 11 ou 12

item.title: B&B de Laubespin
item.body: Lodging located in an open area north of Brussels (15 minutes by car to the city centre). The owners accommodate you in their house in French, Dutch, English, Italian or Spanish. At proximity: Exhibitions Park of Heyzel/Atomium (3 minutes by foot).One double bedroom (+/- 50 m2) - 1 sleeping couch + possibility of an extra bed for one person - private shower-room and WC microwave oven - no smoking - no animals - stay from 3 to 20 nights.Situation : rue de l' Aubespin 1020 BruxellesAccess : métro Stuyvenbergh

item.title: B&B Jean Robie
item.body: In the heart of Brussels, in a quiet street in the historic district of Saint-Gilles, three young people in their thirties will welcome you in a newly renovated early 20th century house. The house is just a stone's throw from several traditional, lively brasseries and the Horta Museum, while the Grand Place is 20 minutes away on foot. The second floor of the house is entirely reserved for guests. French, English, Dutch and Spanish spoken.Large bedroom adjoining a living room, with a balcony overlooking the street – private toilets and bathroom. Possibility of an extra sofa bed, en-suite with the bedroom in the living room (ideal for a couple with children or friends travelling together).Situation : Rue Jean Robie - 1060 BruxellesAccess : Métro Horta (3-4-51), Tram 81-83-97, Bus 48-54

item.title: B&B Jamar
item.body: Accommodation in a brand new flat in a multicultural district just a stone's throw from Midi Station. French spoken. Double-bedded room on the 1st floor (lift) – private shower room (not adjoining the room) – small terrace – possibility to use the owner's living room (with TV) and kitchen (washing machine and dryer) - 1 to 15 night stays – no smoking – no pets – access to a closed garage.Situation : Boulevard Jamar 1060 Bruxelles Access : Gare du midi Tram 51- 81-82 Bus : 49 - 50 Métro

item.title: B&B La Glycine
item.body: Very easy to find when arriving via the Paris-Brussels motorway or from Midi Station (Thalys, Eurostar); sunny room located in a house built in 1905 in a green, open district of Brussels. Nearby: Wiels (Contemporary Art), Forest National (concerts), Némo 33 - the deepest indoor swimming pool in the world (diving), etc.The house is very close to the small Forest-East station, from where you can get to Central Station (centre of Brussels) in 10 minutes.Twin-bedded room (3rd floor/stairs) – small living area with fitted kitchen area – private shower and toilet – no smoking – no pets (cat in the house) - 1 to 30 night stays – easy parking.Location: Avenue Kersbeek – 1190 Brussels (Forest)Access: trams 82 et 97 bus 50–54 (vers quartier Européen) Train: gare de Forest-Est (vers gares Midi, Centrale, Zaventem).

item.title: Côté Parc
item.body: "Côté Parc" is a charming suite of two rooms magnificently decorated, at first floor of a 1913 "Maison de Maître". It is composed of a spacious living room offering a wonderful view on Park Elisabeth, close to the Basilique of Koekelberg

item.title: B&B La Villa Rose
item.body: Located in one of the capital's greenest districts, not far from the forest of Soignes and one of the most beautiful garden cities in Brussels "the Logis-Floréal", the Villa Rose was entirely renovated on the occasion of its hundredth anniversary. It combines early century architecture and contemporary decoration, enhanced by numerous works of Belgian artists. For your convenience, the Villa Rose has private parking facilities. Nearby public transport services will take you directly into the city centre. You will also find in the neighbourhood a wide range of shops, as well as a swimming pool-wellness centre and numerous restaurants. Double guest room (1st floor) - private bathroom and toilet - no smoking - no animals - French, Dutch and English spoken. You can pay with Visa or Mastercard at the B&B We offer to our  guests a private lounge on the ground floor (with libr- ary, International  TV channels, coffee, tea, CD and DVD player, wifi) Situation : Karrenberg 1170 Bruxelles Access : bus 95 Tram : 94 Métro Herman Debroux à 15 minutes à pied.

item.title: B&B Laeken
item.body: A modern and spacious house situated in a residential area to the north of the city. Guests have their own separate entrance. The lady of the house is an interior designer and loves to travel. Near Parc des Expositions, Tour Japonaise and the Serres Royales. Twin room (1st floor), light and airy with view over fields - washbasin - PLEASE NOTE: NO BREAKFAST IS BEING SERVED! - private shower & W.C. - mezzanine lounge with sofa bed and desk - easy access to motorway - easy parking - non-smoker - stay from 2 to 30 days . No pets. Situation : avenue de la Bugrane 1020 Bruxelles Bus 53, trams 23, 52 et 92 (15 min.).

item.title: B&B Le verger
item.body: This comfortable B&B is located in a magnificent house in the pleasant borough of Boitfort (Floréal district). The house is a harmonious combination of the charm of yesteryear and modern comfort, in a lovely pastoral setting, with fruit trees in the garden. The house is short walk from the magnificent forest of Soignes, close to the European institutions and public transport. There is a small local market on Sunday mornings Double bedroom (1st floor) - Private shower room and toilets - No smoking - No pets (1 cat in the house) - 1 to 30 night stays (without kitchen) - French, Dutch and Spanish spoken - private parking facilities. Situation : Avenue Emile Vanbecelaere 1170 Bruxelles Access : Gare de Boitsfort à 10 minutes à pied - Bus 17 - 95 - Tram 25 - 94
item.address: av Emile Van Becelaere/Emile van Becelaerelaan,90

item.title: B&B Milcamps
item.body: In a district located in the North of Brussels, near the European Commission, Daniel and Elsa will welcome you in their beautiful 1930s home.The accommodation consists of a fully renovated, spacious and bright room (60 m2). Private entrance. Numerous restaurants in the immediate vicinity of the B&B.Don't miss the wonderful organic food market on the nearby Place des Chasseurs Ardennais, where the numerous stalls offer a variety of locally produced and organic food every Friday between 2 p.m. and 9 p.m.You can also enjoy a stroll in one of the numerous parks and gardens nearby (Cinquantenaire, Josaphat, Ambiorix). Shops and convenience stores are open 7 days a weekEasy access from the motorway and the airport.Refrigerator and micro wave at your disposal . Organic breakfast served on request (additional charge)Double bedroom (3rd floor - stairs) – private shower room and toilets – no pets (cat in the house) – no smoking - 2 to 30 night stays.Situation : avenue Milcamps 1030 BruxellesAccess :Bus: 29, 63, 21 (bus direct centre-ville) Bus aéroport: 21 et 12 (city express) Tram 7 - 25 Métro : Diamant

item.title: B&B Les années folles
item.body: A quiet B&B located in the North of Brussels, a stone's throw from Schaerbeek station. The B&B has preserved the 1920s art deco style and combines calm and beauty. It is spacious and comfortable, leading onto a sunny terrace. Whether you come to discover Brussels or for training or business reasons, the B&B is ideally situated: 15 minutes by public transport from the Grand Place in the centre of Brussels, the European district, Brussels port, the Heysel Exhibition Centre and NATO headquarters. Carole and Jacques, who are both natives of Brussels and love their city, will be delighted to welcome you for varying lengths of stay. The owners speak French and Dutch and have a basic knowledge of English. Villo (bicycle rental) and Cambio (car-sharing) stations nearby. Double bedroom (on the mezzanine floor) – private bathroom and separate private WC – terrace – smoking authorised only on the terrace - no pets - 15 to 30 night staysSituation : av Huart Hamoir 1030 BruxellesAccess : Tram : 7- 55-92 Bus : 58 - 59 - 69 Gare : Schaerbeek

item.title: Sonian Wood Bed&Breakfast
item.body:
Sonian Wood Bed and Breakfast is named after the Zoniën Woud/Forêt de Soignes – the forest that surrounds the southeast edge of Brussels.
 
Our home, nestled in a friendly village neighbourhood, is about thirty minutes by public transportation to the centre of Brussels and a three minute walk to the Sonian Forest - vast and beautiful for strolling, biking, jogging....
 
Within walking distance are many shops, restaurants of diverse cuisines and a flourishing outdoor market on Sundays.

item.title: Shared B&B
item.body: The B&B is located in the heart of Brussels only 150 meters away from the prestigious Avenue Louise and in the trendy Chatelain district. You can enjoy the stylish shopping area and the antique shops, but there are also lots of cafes and restaurants to visit. The European headquarters and the international south-station are just minutes away. The historical city center, the most important theaters and museums are located nearby. This is the perfect location from which you can explore Brussels and everything it has to offer! During your stay you will be our only guest(s) in the apartment. Our B&B is designed to guarantee your privacy, while you enjoy being part of Brussels city live. You will find a fully equipped kitchen, separate bathroom, relax area and sleeping area. This is the place to be for your short stay as well as your long stay. If you only stay for 1 night we will charge you an extra Eur 10,-. We make it our work to make you feel at home!

item.title: Choco Bed&Breakfast
item.body: 10 minutes from the airport and frequent public transport takes you to the city centre and downtown Brussels .Bus 28 to Shuman station and CEE will pick you up at less than 100m. Lines 11 and 12 from the airport, and tram 23,24 et 25 will drive you to Heuysel Palais and Zud Station. Bus 80 will drive you by Quartier Léopold and Europeen Parlment. The metro stop "Georges Henri" is a few meters away, and the metro stop "Montgomery" is a few minutes walk. The biggest mall is a few stops away by bus 29. Parking is easy, and bikes are in supply

item.title: B&B Les Iris
item.body: We welcome you in a charming family house built in 1910. Come and discover the brussels hospitality during your stay in the heart of the capital of Europe. We welcome you in French, Dutch, English and German. The whole house is smoke and pet free. In the neighbourhood, you will find many small businesses, cafés and restaurants but also many green areas where you can go for walk and relax. The nature reserve "The Moeraske", the Witloofmuseum at the Geuzenberg or the Mill of Evere, for example, are pieces of the municipality inheritage. Near our house, you will also find Everna, the Flemish arts centrer, the Toots arts centre, a swimming pool, a fitness centre, a laundry ...

item.title: Maison Noble
item.body: You are located at less than 5 minutes walking - distance from the "Sainte-Catherine" metro station The famous Grand-Place is within 10 minutes walking distance from here, as well as the "Gay village". The rapidly changing fashion designer area is only 5 minutes away, as well as the central "Place De Brouckere". Ideally served by the Brussels public transport system, you can also find a bicycle rental station very close, for a different view or perspective of the "heart of Europe". Upon your arrival and depending at what time, we will be happy to offer you a welcome drink in the lounge or in our court yard, and will provide you with all the information you may need at this occasion. Ps!! Please indicate your approximate time of arrival when making a booking.

item.title: B&B La Cambre
item.body: Nearby the Étangs d'Ixelles (Ixelles ponds), the owner of a typical huge Brussels house welcomes you in French, English, Spanish and Dutch. The house is ideally located nearby several museums: the Wiertz museum, Ixelles museum, Natural Sciences museum, the Abbey of La Cambre and ULB. Restaurants, bars, cybercafés and public transport only a footstep away. Twin room (2nd floor) - Private shower and toilets - the room's balcony is a terrace - no smoking - no animals - stay from 2 to 30 nights. Location : rue des Echevins 1050 Bruxelles Access : Bus 71 Trams 7 - 25 - 81 - 71 Gare : Etterbeek

item.title: B&B Art Nouveau
item.body: Build in 1906 and owned by his family since 1910, this house and architecture have been entirely revisited in the actual most desirable Art-Nouveau style.Today's heir Terry has made a living out of this passion,sharing his time and works in the remaining steps of Victor Horta, in accordance with the Horta Museum.Make sure he'll be a perfect virtual Art-Nouveau guide while staying with him.Scattered with original details and restaured on a true passion, the house represents a true quietness for both body and soul.Double room with private bath and private and separate restroom - kitchen - living room - No smoking - no pets - 2 to 30-night stays Location : rue Georges Moreau 1070 BruxellesAccess : Gare du Midi à 400 m Tram 81-82-52

item.title: Brusselsguesthouse
item.body: The house has an interesting history and is located at around 15 minutes on foot from the Brussels Grand Place and the European Commission Offices (or less for Covent Garden building). We are located near the railways, trams and metro entrances. Our guesthouse has a free secure wireless internet connection (WIFI) for guests who'd like to use their notebook (or Ipad, Iphone...) and an internal parking space is also for free at their disposal. Special gifts are offered to our new guests.

item.title: La Dame de Carreau
item.body: "Dame de Carreau" is located next to the Simonis metro station with easy access to the city centre, Brussels Expo and the EU institutions. Our two rooms offer excellent "value for money" rates with self service breakfast available all day long. Homelike atmosphere and good tips for culture and food. Our place is also a perfect hub for visiting the main Belgian cities and attractions, Paris, Amsterdam, Cologne and London. Decreasing rates as from the third night ! No smoking rooms - No pets allowed - Bathroom shared between the two rooms - 60 EUR / night (double), 55 EUR / night (single). 10% discount as from 3 nights, 15 EUR extra for one night stays. Self-service breakfast and wifi access offered - Location: 29 rue de l'Armistice, 1081 Brussels. Access: Simonis station (metro lines 2 and 6), tram 19, bus 13-14-15, South and North Stations.

item.title: B&B speculoos
item.body: Close by the Ixelles Ponds, This accommodation will allow you to easily go to the European Institutions quarter ; the Wiertz, Ixelles's or Natural Science museums and the "La Cambre " abbaye . The city center only 10-15 min. away . The house is decorated in an artistic way and according to the Feng Shui philosophy. Your hostess, professional artist, made the paintings and interior design of the room. Your breakfast will be served in your living-room, at the time you want, in plates and cups she decorated. Double bedroom (on the 2d floor / stairs ) - Private bathroom and WC - Living room with sofa bed - non smoking - No pets - Stay from 1 to 30 nights. Location: rue de la Levure - 1050 Brussels access : Bus : 38, 59, 60, 71, 95 / Trams : 81

item.title: B&B Paul Deschanel
item.body: If you are looking for peace and well being in the center of Brussels, you will enjoy in "Hotel de Maître" completely renovated in 2013. The area that is both quiet and lively with in the immediate vicinity: many restaurants and bars, grocery stores, supermarkets, the beautiful Josaphat park, a public swimming pool and sports facilities,... Double room "Manhattan suite" + sofabed for 2 more people - private bat- hroom with separate toilet - bar area with fridge, microwave, sink, electrical kettle, cooker available upon request - iPad available in each room - the opportunity to park your car in a private closed garage box (with surcharge) - the lounge area - the access codes allowing you to arrive at any time Location : Avenue Paul Deschanel, 1030 Brussels Access : Tram 7, 25, 92 Bus 59, 65, 66 Villo station

item.title: Côté jardin
item.body: Côté Jardin is a very nice and modern B&B located in Watermael-Boitsfort (the verdant district in the south-east of Brussels) next to Brussels city and Forêt de Soignes. A privet part of the house is reserved to our guest and we offer them twin or double bedrooms all with TV and privet bathroom. There is also a living room and a kitcken accessible for our guests. Our rooms all have decorative themes playing on different colours. Breakfast is included and served in a very nice part of the house with view on the garden. We are looking forward to share all the nice activities in the hood or downtown. Direct bus (95) going into the center of Brussels at 2 min walking and easy parking.
